description: Call to see this 2 bedroom apartment in nice area.

show contact info

title: 2 Bedroom Apartment
description: 2 bedroom Apartment, assigned parking for two vehicles, appliances, heat and hot water included. Coin Op washer and dryer on property. Quiet private dead end road, surrounded by wooded area and one family homes. Half mile from Rt. 146 Exit. Most pets welcome with additional pet security deposit.

title: 3 bedroom 2nd Floor
description: 2nd floor. 3 Bedroom, 1 bath. Heat and hot water included. Laundry hookups. Nice apt and neighborhood. Conveniently located. No smoking. No pets. $1100 month .  1st + Security. Call Dan.
show contact info

title: Oversized 1 Bed - 1 Bath- Flat- Close to Dog Park. Heat Included!
description: Awarded best new loft apartment community in the United States by
National Association of Home Builders! Luxury, modern lofts and
flats in a historic setting that let you live the life you want to.
Step into your new home and enjoy the soaring ceilings, original
rough-hewn beams, and over-sized windows that let in an abundance
of light to splash across the exposed brick walls. These are
stylish loft apartments, each with its own unique architectural
character and enhanced by an array of hand-selected designer
finishes. Welcome to a world defined by your personal space.
-Exposed brick walls with unique details in every home
-Self Cleaning Oven
-Conveniently located to nearby shopping and dining, such as Walmart, Dunkin Donuts, Kohls, Stop N Shop, Brigidos Fresh Market, Bank of America, and much more!
-Walk-In Closet
-Historic mill building with modern luxuries in a serene and natural setting
-Wheelchair Access
-Dramatic 10 ft windows
-Barbecue Grills
-Kitchen Island
-BBQ/Picnic Area
-Designer kitchens and bathrooms
